scripts.start: npm install &&npm run dev-client & npm run dev-server
scripts.preview: npm run build:watch & npm run prod-server
scripts.final: deno pack server or deno bundle server
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run final
scripts.publish: rm -d -r ./node_modules && rm package-lock.json && rm server/deno.lock && git publish && npm i
scripts.create-index: echo '<script rel="preconnect" type="module" crossorigin src="./main.jsx"></script><link rel="stylesheet" href="./index.css" />' > ./client/index.html
